item.title: Help me?
item.dc:creator: @Zian Zian
item.description:
@Zian wrote:

What one are you using? I am using Divine PK V5.0 and I like it, only thing I can complain about right now is the high EXP rates but that is fixable I just have to figure out how to fix it…

Divine PK V5.0 Download (client & server pack) http://uppit.com/DDK9FP

Another thread that has EVER more servers listed http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,295632.0.html

The issue you are having sounds to me like you might not have configured your run.bat properly

to make your own run.bat just open notepad or notepad++ and put this code into it, but replace the pathing to the correct file pathing for your system

set PATH=%PATH%;C:\Program Files\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07

Then save it as run.bat stick it in your server folder and have fun.

Read full topic
